--- In gladiator@y..., gladiatorbc@y... wrote:
> Does anybody have a suggestion for a good team in gladiator.

You know that's a loaded question around here.

The best team is 1 mage, 1 archmage, and 2 clerics.  Of course, that 
means you'll start with 2 clerics and 2 mages.  It's extremely at 
first with that team until everybody picks up experience.  Once your 
clerics reach experience level 4 and you have an archamge that summon 
fire elementals, most scenarios become really easy to beat.

My favorite team, of course, had 2 of most character types.
